content: निर्हारः {@--1@} Taking away, removing, removal. {@--2@} Drawing out, extracting. {@--3@} Rooting up, destruction. {@--4@} Carrying out a dead body to be burnt. {@--5@} Accumulation of a private store of wealth, private hoard; <ls>Ms. 9. 199.</ls> {@--6@} Evacuation of the natural excrements of the body (<ab>opp.</ab> आहार). {@--7@} Putting forth or out. {@--8@} Setting aside, excluding, leaving.
